name: Cheese Race
description:
A very simple 2d platformer, where you control a silly mouse.

The rodent can jump: use the jump button (the touchscreen button on the right, the right arrow key on PC/Mac), hold longer for higher jumps. It can also change direction (use the touchscreen button on the left, the left arrow key on PC/Mac).

Mice are always hungry. This one will need a whole lot of cheese. Feed it and it will run faster. Let it starve and it will fall asleep.

Source code is available on Github.
